item.title: Prisca add a quote by John Keats
item.description: "You speak of Lord Byron and me; there is this great difference between us. He describes what he sees I describe what I imagine. Mine is the hardest task." -- John Keats

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Fyodor Dostoyevsky
item.description: "It was a marvelous night, the sort of night one only experiences when one is young. The sky was so bright, and there were so many stars that, gazing upward, one couldn't help wondering how so many whimsical, wicked people could live under such a sky." -- Fyodor Dostoyevsky

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Charles Baudelaire
item.description: "Always be a poet, even in prose." -- Charles Baudelaire

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Sergei Rachmaninoff
item.description: "The new kind of music seems to create not from the heart but from the head. Its composers think rather than feel. They have not the capacity to make their works exalt - they meditate, protest, analyze, reason, calculate and brood, but they do not exalt." -- Sergei Rachmaninoff

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Julie Kagawa
item.description: "Me? Die? Didn't they tell you, princess? I'm Robin Goodfellow." -- Julie Kagawa

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Tahu kau mengapa aku sayangi kau lebih dari siapa pun? Karena kau menulis. Suaramu takkan padam ditelan angin, akan abadi, sampai jauh, jauh di kemudian hari. (Mama, 84)" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Yana Toboso
item.description: "Humans cannot reject temptation. When they are plunged into the depths of despair, likened to hell, they will hold on to anything that may help them escape from the situation they are in, even if it's merely a spider's thread, no matter what sort of humans they are." -- Yana Toboso

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Prisca add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Prisca add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Kita semua punya cara sendiri-sendiri untuk mengobati kesedihan, bukan? -Ekaterina Fyodorovna-" -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Jalan ke rumah sahabat tidak pernah jauh. Begitu pula jalan untuk menggapai mimpimu." -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "...waktu akan berjalan sangat cepat ketika kita mengharapkannya berhenti..." -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Mungkin air mata itu sedang memperoloknya, enggan untuk menemaninya, mengingat ia dan kesendirian adalah dua sahabat yang amat sulit untuk dipisahkan." -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Atmosfer hujan selalu mampu membawa seseorang berkelana ke masa lalu." -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Ada kalanya batas mimpi dan kenyataan terasa begitu kabur, terutama bila terlalu sering bermimpi." -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Kau tak bisa mencapai impian sendirian, terutama bila kau tidak mempunyai motivasi untuk mewujudkannya. -Yuki Akihara" -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Lhiver, impian itu harus tinggi. Kalau kau hanya menginginkan uang 600 franc, kau tidak akan pernah bisa mendapatkan 600.000 franc. -Kay Olivier" -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Kita akan selalu bersama dengan yang benar-benar kita cintai, sekeras apapun kita menghindar. -Vesna Vasilievna" -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "...setelah kepahitan pekat ini, rasa manis pasti akan menjelang." -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Dan bila ada hal yang membahagiakan sekaligus menyedihkan untuk dipikirkan, itu adalah masa lalu yang indah... -Kay Olivier" -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "...bahkan karang pun akan pecah bila terlindas sesuatu yang tak terbayangkan beratnya." -- Prisca Primasari

item.title: Prisca add a quote by Prisca Primasari
item.description: "Sejujurnya, penyakit apa pun tidaklah penting. Yang penting adalah apakah penyakit itu berarti hidup atau mati." -- Prisca Primasari
